SELECT a.id, a.name, a.img_url_list, a.is_collection, a.details, a.category_id, a.create_time, b.name AS categoryName, COUNT(c.id) AS download_num FROM wallpaper_info AS a LEFT JOIN category AS b ON a.category_id = b.id LEFT JOIN download_record AS c ON c.wallpaper_id = a.id
AND a.`name` LIKE #{reqDTO.name}
GROUP BY a.id
ORDER BY a.create_time DESC
ORDER BY download_num DESC

SELECT a.id, a.name, a.img_url_list, a.is_collection, a.details, a.category_id, b.name AS categoryName, c.id AS userId, c.nickname, c.head_img, COUNT(DISTINCT d.id) AS collectNum, COUNT(DISTINCT e.id) AS download_num FROM wallpaper_info AS a LEFT JOIN category AS b ON a.category_id = b.id LEFT JOIN consumer_user AS c ON c.id = a.create_id LEFT JOIN wallpaper_collect_record AS d ON d.wallpaper_id = a.id LEFT JOIN download_record AS e ON e.wallpaper_id = a.id WHERE a.id = #{id}
SELECT b.* FROM wallpaper_collect_record AS a LEFT JOIN wallpaper_info AS b ON b.id = a.wallpaper_id WHERE a.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC

SELECT b.id, b.`name`, b.img_url_list, b.is_collection, b.details, COUNT(c.id) AS download_num FROM wallpaper_collect_record AS a LEFT JOIN wallpaper_info AS b ON b.id = a.wallpaper_id LEFT JOIN download_record AS c ON c.wallpaper_id = a.wallpaper_id WHERE a.favorites_id = #{reqDTO.favoritesId} GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY a.create_time
